pr_title: ChatFilter: Add config section for Filter Lists

timeline.message:
ChatFilter: Add config section for Filter Lists

The chat filter config can get pretty unruly if you have a lot of word and regex filters. This adds a config section akin to the `Item Lists` section in `Ground Items`.  `Filter type` config was shifted down to be with the rest of the configs.

timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -113,7 +125,7 @@ default boolean filterLogin()
 		keyName = "collapseGameChat",
 		name = "Collapse Game Chat",
 		description = "Collapse duplicate game chat messages into a single line",
-		position = 9
+		position = 8

replies.bodyText: iirc my intent was to have the positions reflect their actual order, making it as clear as possible when viewing ChatFilterConfig. Previously it went from 7 to 9, so I corrected it.
replies.author: Broooklyn

replies.bodyText: There's no need for positions to be contiguous. Please revert the unneeded position changes to this file.
replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Just make this position 1 like "Filter type" was before
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: I was just following the precedent set by Hydrox, but I'm happy to change it if you feel I should.
replies.author: Broooklyn
